short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hide Youtube suggestions and comments so you won't get distracted.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Have you ever gotten distracted by the youtube suggestions? With this extension, you will never get caught in the endless web of videos. You can save time, and you will be more productive.
